title: Gedolei Yisroel Show Support
body: Gedolei Torah send Ariel Shamai, a yeshiva bochur who recently completed a prison term for refusing to report to the IDF, a rare letter of chizuk at Yeshivas Ateres Shlomo.

title: Rav Eliyahu Raful Passes Away
body: Rav Eliyahu Raful zt”l, rosh yeshiva of Yeshiva Neveh Eretz, passes away at 95. A pioneer of the Sephardic yeshiva world, he was a leading marbitzei Torah of his generation.
